item.title: James add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "I have always been a romantic; one of those who believes that a woman in pink circus tights holds all the secrets of the world." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: James add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Disbelief in magic can force a poor soul into believing in government and business." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: James add a quote by Denis Johnson
item.description: "Die in one universe and yet in another go on without a hitch. If this were true, the person who understood it would have conquered death. Would be invulnerable. Would be the Superman. There's a dizzying thrill in a philosophy that can only be tested by suicide -- and then never proven, only tested again by another attempt. And the person embarked on that series of tests, treading that trail of lives as if from boulder to boulder across the river of time -- no, out into the burning ocean of eternity -- what a mutant! Some new genesis, like a pale, poisonous daisy." -- Denis Johnson

item.title: James add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: James add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Freedom is something that dies unless it's used." -- Hunter S. Thompson
